TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: A Whole New World

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_mz3vmivw7w1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/shDtyuMb_xg" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>This short, but sweet video by Axel499 shows that you can discover “a whole new world” from space, even if that world you already knew about.</p>

Man, it's been a while since I last heard that song.

Bootiful.
i love this video haha i saw it on /r/Kspmemes on reddit

is it just me or is every video posted to the KSP blog that Neil cinematic?

That's an screen cap for what I see when I go to http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/ and not the video linking in this forum post.
I don't get that, I get the new video image. Looks like your browser cache needs wiping.
Got it... clearing cache didn't fix it. but I found a list of firefox shortcuts and ctrl+f5 worked to override whatever was wrong.
Cool! It's really a new world if that comes true.
